name: Space Descent
description:
Controls:  
W or Up Arrow: Move upward
A or Left Arrow: Move leftward
S or Down Arrow: Move downward
D or Right Arrow: Move rightward

If the game stucks in loading, please download the attached zip files to play

Made by using Unity 2020.3.4f1 for Weekly Game Jam #198 (Theme: Descent)

Caution:

There is a  2minutes of Unskippable Story Telling Scene before gameplay  started

Story description

In the future, news about a professor on earth discovers an infinity energy ball that has gone viral. 

Around the universe, people from earth to aliens have mobilised to steal the energy ball.

 The professor decides to travel to a black hole. He plans to lure those thieves into the black hole and use the energy ball to force close the black hole, trapping them in it. 

 Unfortunately, he dropped the energy ball into the black hole. The professor who wanted back his property travel into the Black Hole following by aliens and human servants. 

Could the professor take back his energy ball before other people?

 Side note, when the energy ball reaches the bottom of the black hole could cause a big bang explosion that could wipe out the universe. 

Could anyone prevent the universe from vanishing in Time!?
